label: Last Minute Hotel Deals
description: Market category for users searching for last minute hotel deals.
intents: Find affordable hotel rooms for a last minute trip.
Book a hotel room for a spontaneous weekend getaway.
Get a discount on a hotel room for a same-day booking.

subcategories.label: UK Hotel Deals
subcategories.description: Last minute hotel deals in the United Kingdom.

subcategories.label: European Hotel Deals
subcategories.description: Last minute hotel deals in Europe.

subcategories.label: International Hotel Deals
